en: Peppa and her family are going to the beach.
zh: 佩奇和家人要去海边玩。

en: Peppa and George love going to the beach.
zh: 佩奇和乔治最喜欢去海边玩了。

en: We must be careful not to forget anything when we go.
zh: 我们一定要小心，别走的时候把东西落下了。

en: Sunshade, beach-bag, towels, buckets and spades, and a spotty ball.
zh: 遮阳伞，海滩包，毛巾，水桶，铲子，还有一个沙滩球。

en: Good. Now, before you start playing, you need some sun cream on.
zh: 很好。现在，在你们玩之前都得涂上防晒霜。

en: The sun is very hot, so Peppa and George have to have sun cream on.
zh: 太阳太毒了，所以佩奇和乔治要涂上防晒霜。

en: Let's try out this spotty ball!
zh: 让我们来玩玩这个沙滩球吧！
真是一个不错的沙滩球！

en: George, you throw the ball and I will catch it!
zh: 乔治，你来扔球然后我来接它！

en: Oh, dear. George is too little to catch the ball.
zh: 哦，糟糕了。乔治太小接不住球。

en: Would you and Peppa like to have a paddle in the sea?
zh: 你和佩奇想去海里趟水吗？

en: You look very smart in your water-wings, George.
zh: 乔治，你带上臂圈后看起来很可爱。

en: Now we can play in the water.
zh: 现在我们可以下水玩了。

en: Daddy, I love being at the beach.
zh: 爸爸，我真喜欢在海边玩。

en: Peppa and George love the beach.
zh: 佩奇和乔治很喜欢在海边玩。
大家都很喜欢在海边玩。

en: Peppa, George, Would you like to play with your buckets and spades?
zh: 佩奇，乔治，你们想玩水桶和铲子吗？

en: Can we bury you in sand?
zh: 我们可以把你埋在沙子里吗？

en: Peppa and George are burying Daddy Pig in the sand!
zh: 佩奇和乔治把猪爸爸埋在沙子里。

en: My head is getting a bit hot.
Can I have my straw hat?
Please, can I have my straw hat?
zh: 请问可以帮我戴草帽吗？

en: That's nice. Maybe I'll just have a little sleep...
zh: 太棒了。也许我可以在这里小睡一会。。。
乔治，我们来搭沙滩城堡吧！

en: Peppa and George are making sand castles!
zh: 佩奇和乔治正在搭城堡。

en: First, we put sand in the buckets.Like this.
zh: 首先，我们把沙铲进水桶。像这样。

en: We turn the buckets upside down and tap them.
zh: 我们将水桶反转，轻拍一下。

en: And lift the bucket up! Hey, presto!
zh: 然后提起来！嘿，变出来吧！

en: Let's check that we haven't forgotten anything.
zh: 让我们来检查一下我们有没有落下了些什么。

en: Towels, beach-bag, sunshade, and the spotty ball.
zh: 毛巾，海滩袋，遮阳伞，和沙滩球。
我觉得我们好像忘了点什么东西。

en: Of course! We forgot the hat!
Daddy, we almost left you behind!
zh: 爸爸，我们差点把你落在沙滩上了！

en: Well, I'm glad George remembered me!
zh: 好的，我很高兴乔治想起了我！
